create.firstname-minlength: Firstname must be at least {min} characters long
create.firstname-maxlength: Firstname must be at most {max} characters long
create.lastname-minlength: Lastname must be at least {min} characters long
create.lastname-maxlength: Lastname must be at most {max} characters long
create.email-minlength: Email must be at least {min} characters long
create.email-maxlength: Email must be at most {min} characters long
create.password-minlength: Password must be at least {min} characters long.
create.password-maxlength: Password must be at most {max} characters long.
create.password-min-one-digit: Password must contain at least one digit
create.password-min-one-symbol: Password must contain at least one symbol (e.g., {'! @ #'}).
create.password-min-one-upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (e.g., A B C).
create.password-min-one-lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter (e.g., a b c).
